messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Harry Potter Club for unschoolers 10-13 yrs. old
messages.msgSnippet: There are about a million sites, etc. For Adult Harry Potter Fans (meaning Grown-ups)  I would check out the eGroup HarryPotter4Adults For fanfiction, try
messages.messageBody:
There are about a million sites, etc.

For Adult Harry Potter Fans (meaning Grown-ups) I would check out the
eGroup HarryPotter4Adults

For fanfiction, try http://www.fanfiction.net (or com)


Pax,
Crys


On Mon, 21 Aug 2000 06:14:11 GMT "linda loux" <starshine_lal@...>
writes:
> My daughters, 11 and 13, LOVE the Harry Potter series. They have
> created a
> very involved mystery game that they play together regularly that
> has gone
> on for months.
>
> Now they are busy writing their own "books" that are take-offs from
> the
> originals. Are there other "Harry Potter-Crazed" Unschoolers out
> there who
> would enjoy sharing stories they have written that were inspired
> from the HP
> books?
>
> Francesca and Sierra would love to be members of a Harry Potter Club
> where
> they could share their stories with others of like-mind along with
> all other
> ideas and games inspired by the HP books.
>
> Please respond if you know of such a group or if you know how we
> could
> create one!
>
> Linda, the mom.
>
